extractionHint.notes: Classify the default based on the block content (e.g., Payment Default, Covenant Default, Bankruptcy, Cross-Default, Judgment, Change in Control).
Extract what obligation, covenant, or liability is breached (e.g., principal, interest, covenants, Indebtedness).
Extract any grace or cure period (e.g., 'five Business Days', '30 days'). If none, return Not Found.
Extract any notice requirement prior to default becoming effective.
Extract any dollar threshold required for the default to apply (e.g., '$20.0 million', '$50,000,000').
Extract carve-outs, exclusions, or limiting conditions that prevent the default from triggering.
Determine whether the default applies automatically (e.g., bankruptcy events) or only after notice/grace. Output 'Yes', 'No', or 'Not Found'.
Extract lender remedies such as termination of commitments or acceleration of loans.
Extract whether acceleration is automatic or discretionary.
Extract any waiver of notice, demand, or protest.
